sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './Cart.css' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' import remove from '../Components/Assest/Ecommerce_Frontend_Assets/Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' export const Cart = () => { const {all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart}=useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0){ return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart()}} alt="" />
} })}
) }
